pages.title: Solar Heater
pages.text: The <item>Solar Heater/$ is a solar panel that produces heat. When in direct sunlight during the day in clear weather, the <item>solar heat/$ will produce heat at a slow steady rate, up to a maximum temperature of 250Â°C.$(br2)This isn't hot enough to run advanced machines- but

it could be used for $(l:crossroads:heat/smelter)smelting/$ or <thing>$(l:crossroads:fluid/steam)steam generation/$.$(br2)A line of <item>solar heaters/$ connected on their copper ends will share heat. The copper ends are also where <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)cables/$ can be connected.$(br2)
This block pairs well with the <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/reserve)Heat Reservoir/$ to store heat generated during the day for use at night.$(br2)
